basics.name: Ernesto Aparicio Puerta
basics.summary: I'm a second year postdoc researcher interested in the analysis of miRNA through sequencing technologies.

work.summary: Working on several topics related to miRNA (isoform quantification, enrichment analysis)

funding.title: Juan de la Cierva Postdoctoral Fellowship
